description: This file defines a Lightning.js component named 'Home'. It imports other components and libraries, and constructs a template for rendering a page with animated logo, loader, text, and button elements. It manages internal state for animations and transitions, and includes lifecycle hooks for initialization.

classes.name: Home
classes.description: A Lightning.js component that represents the home page with animated logo, loader, text, and button.

methods.name: rotateColors
methods.description: Cycles through a predefined list of colors, updating the component's 'color' property at specified intervals.
